title: LivingTree
description:
LivingTree connects everyone who helps raise, develop, and educate children.
App Features (all in one location!):
* Notifications - SMS texts, email notifications, mobile push notifications, you choose how to inform and engage your community members!
* Conversations â€“ A live stream of messages and media posts from all the people helping raise our childrenâ€¦.all in a single view!  Join the conversation and feel the community connect.
* Shared Calendar â€“ A shared calendar for families, groups, and organizations with volunteer sign up and management, reminders, and notificationsâ€¦.no more missed calls, e-mails, paper noticesâ€¦itâ€™s all right here!
* Photo Sharing & Archiving (Memories) â€“ Photos and fun from all the people in your childrenâ€™s life (your own paparazzi)!  Pin these memories (and your own) to as many of your personal mixes as you like for the ultimate experience in chronicling and cherishing the milestones, interests, and moments you never want to forget.
* Direct Messaging â€“ All the contacts associated with your children in a single placeâ€¦no more searching rosters and websites or trying to remember names; connect seamlessly with LivingTree.
Why LivingTree?
LivingTree was built by parents for parents, to connect all the people who work together to raise and teach our kids in one safe place.  We believe the journey of parenting is awesome â€“ LivingTreeâ€™s patent pending architecture uniquely builds around each child / family unit allowing groups and organizations to snap into the communication flow seamlessly and where relevantâ€¦.a single point of connection for families, classes, teams, groups, and organizations.
Who should use LivingTree?
* Parent engagement is the single biggest driver of student success from literacy to graduation. Schools, teachers, and parents should use LivingTree to build partnerships and positive relationships.
* Busy parents and caregivers who are looking for a tool to help organize, coordinate and share the most important moments of their children's lives.
* Teachers, coaches, or other youth leaders who dream of effectively engaging with their group's parents, from classroom sharing or game highlights, to parent sign-ups, schedules and volunteering.
* Organizations such as schools and leagues that desire a single platform to centralize all management and communication of schedules and updates with their staff and parent communities.
How does LivingTree help?
The LivingTree app is a companion to the web based LivingTree platform (www.livingtree.com) which delivers a single, safe place to manage, engage, and share in raising our children.  Use this app to stay connected and get on the go updates.
* Managing â€“ Spend less time coordinating.  Automatic updates to  shared calendars and activity awareness for everyone helping raise childrenâ€¦weâ€™ll handle the notifications and reminders!
* Engaging â€“ Raising children takes more than one person.  We work to connect and create more transparency â€“ instant alerts and notifications, live conversations, schedules, volunteering, conference sign-ups, snack parent duty, etc. - LivingTree creates a more aware and engaged community.
* Sharing â€“ Special moments happen daily with children and students. LivingTree offers a private, safe and easy way to share those moments, and a beautiful way to remember them forever.
description_html:
b"LivingTree connects everyone who helps raise, develop, and educate children.

App Features (all in one location!):
* Notifications - SMS texts, email notifications, mobile push notifications, you choose how to inform and engage your community members!
* Conversations \xe2\x80\x93 A live stream of messages and media posts from all the people helping raise our children\xe2\x80\xa6.all in a single view! Join the conversation and feel the community connect.
* Shared Calendar \xe2\x80\x93 A shared calendar for families, groups, and organizations with volunteer sign up and management, reminders, and notifications\xe2\x80\xa6.no more missed calls, e-mails, paper notices\xe2\x80\xa6it\xe2\x80\x99s all right here!
* Photo Sharing & Archiving (Memories) \xe2\x80\x93 Photos and fun from all the people in your children\xe2\x80\x99s life (your own paparazzi)! Pin these memories (and your own) to as many of your personal mixes as you like for the ultimate experience in chronicling and cherishing the milestones, interests, and moments you never want to forget.
* Direct Messaging \xe2\x80\x93 All the contacts associated with your children in a single place\xe2\x80\xa6no more searching rosters and websites or trying to remember names; connect seamlessly with LivingTree.

Why LivingTree?
LivingTree was built by parents for parents, to connect all the people who work together to raise and teach our kids in one safe place. We believe the journey of parenting is awesome \xe2\x80\x93 LivingTree\xe2\x80\x99s patent pending architecture uniquely builds around each child / family unit allowing groups and organizations to snap into the communication flow seamlessly and where relevant\xe2\x80\xa6.a single point of connection for families, classes, teams, groups, and organizations.

Who should use LivingTree?
* Parent engagement is the single biggest driver of student success from literacy to graduation. Schools, teachers, and parents should use LivingTree to build partnerships and positive relationships.
* Busy parents and caregivers who are looking for a tool to help organize, coordinate and share the most important moments of their children's lives.
* Teachers, coaches, or other youth leaders who dream of effectively engaging with their group's parents, from classroom sharing or game highlights, to parent sign-ups, schedules and volunteering.
* Organizations such as schools and leagues that desire a single platform to centralize all management and communication of schedules and updates with their staff and parent communities.

How does LivingTree help?
The LivingTree app is a companion to the web based LivingTree platform (www.livingtree.com) which delivers a single, safe place to manage, engage, and share in raising our children. Use this app to stay connected and get on the go updates.
* Managing \xe2\x80\x93 Spend less time coordinating. Automatic updates to shared calendars and activity awareness for everyone helping raise children\xe2\x80\xa6we\xe2\x80\x99ll handle the notifications and reminders!
* Engaging \xe2\x80\x93 Raising children takes more than one person. We work to connect and create more transparency \xe2\x80\x93 instant alerts and notifications, live conversations, schedules, volunteering, conference sign-ups, snack parent duty, etc. - LivingTree creates a more aware and engaged community.
* Sharing \xe2\x80\x93 Special moments happen daily with children and students. LivingTree offers a private, safe and easy way to share those moments, and a beautiful way to remember them forever."

title: ASVAB Practice Test 2018-  AFQT, NAVY & Air Force
description:
"Best App to prepare for US Army or Navy"
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery (ASVAB ) is a multiple choice test, administered by the United States Military Entrance Processing Command.
ASVAB Practice Test provides many training questions for people who want to take a test and pass ASVAB Exam for US army or US Navy or US Airforce.
ASVAB app allows students to efficiently study ASVAB practice questions anytime, anywhere.
Life can be challenging and stressful. Let the ASVAB App help you achieve the results and career advancement
you have been working so hard towards.
The ASVAB (Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery) is a multiple choice test, administered by the United States Military
Entrance Processing Command, used to determine qualification for enlistment in the United States armed forces.
It is often offered to American high school students when they are in the 10th, 11th and 12th grade,
though anyone eligible for enlistment may take it.
Categories:
1. General Science
2. Arithmetic Reasoning
3. Word Knowledge
4. Paragraph Comprehension
5. Mathematics Knowledge
6. Electronics Information
7. Auto and Shop Information
8. Mechanical Comprehension
Features-
You can play Quiz.
- You can play Quiz like Level wise and each next level is hard then before.
- You can see your Quiz results too like how many Correct, Incorrect, Unattended and scores.

title: HiMama â€“ The Childcare App
description:
Go digital with the #1 rated childcare app! Complete your preschool daily reports, schedules, attendance, check-ins and meal planning in half the time. Send parents daily sheets, pictures, videos and invoices they will love. Easily align lesson planning and development observations with your curriculum or guidelines. "HiMama has become a huge asset for our school! Parents love the photos, and daily reports. Teachers all agree that it is extremely easy to use and replaces piles of paperwork."
Best of all, HiMama is an all-in-one solution with every feature you need to run your center effectively.
CHILD CARE DAILY DOCUMENTATION
â€¢
Daily reports / sheets
- Fill out meals, snacks, sleep checks, toileting, activities and observations, medication and mood for individual children or multiple children at a time
â€¢
Flexible activity planning
- Schedule activities and lessons on-the-fly or months in advance
â€¢
Attendance
- Check-in children, record drop-off and pick-up times
LEARNING AND DEVELOPMENT
â€¢
Photo and video observations
- Tag real-time observations with images from the classroom
â€¢
Internal development reports
- Follow a childâ€™s development across developmental domains, skills and indicators
â€¢
Framework and curriculum alignment
- Customized to fit your state or provinceâ€™s early learning guidelines and compatible with Reggio-inspired, play-based, emergent, Montessori, and traditional programs
PARENT ENGAGEMENT AND COMMUNICATION
â€¢
App parent portal
- Parents can view photos, videos, daily reports and schedules, update their childâ€™s information, and message educators in their own private, secure account.
â€¢
Real-time photo sharing
- Parents can receive timely updates throughout the day
â€¢
Email, text, and in-app communication
- Send messages, alerts and reminders to individual parents or an entire room
DIRECTOR AND ADMINISTRATOR FEATURES
â€¢
Attendance
- Record absences and have oversight into check-in, check-out times
â€¢
Classroom reports
- Ensure your preschool is running smoothly with attendance, sleep check, meal, toileting, and activity reports
â€¢
Centralized parent and child information
- Directors or parents can update contact, emergency, allergies and health information
â€¢
Menu planning & sharing
- Input meal and snack schedule for parents to view and educators to use in daily reporting
â€¢
Enrollment
- View upcoming, current and graduated children, schedule rotation and days attending
â€¢
Billing
- Send professional invoices and create Smart Billing plans by age group and days attending
â€¢
Staff management
- Check-in staff with real-time ratios, view timecards and manage scheduling and time off
Above all, HiMama is secure, reliable and easy-to-use, even for the not so tech savvy. All of the child care centerâ€™s information is backed-up and synced, and can be accessed through any of our apps and our website.
We have a friendly customer support team that would be happy to answer your questions, which you can reach by phone (1-800-905-1876) or email (support@himama.com).

title: Improve English: Word Games
description:
Knudge.me helps you learn and improve English in an easy, interesting and effective way.
The platform works on scientific algorithms which help you to learn and improve English in an effective way. The courses are designed to help improve vocabulary, the understanding of English idioms and commonly confused English words, the knowledge of phrasal verbs,  homonyms/homophones etc. which would eventually elevate your skills to new heights. Learn English smartly!
Courses:
1. Vocabulary Builder - Easy
: Selected by experts, this wordlist includes definitions and usages for every word. Handy English flashcards given in this wordlist make it easier to memrise and improve vocabulary, and learn English in an enjoyable way.
2. Vocabulary Builder - Intermediate
: A must-learn wordlist to improve vocabulary, it comprises 200+ words, and includes definitions, synonyms/antonyms, and infographics which help improve English smoothly. A good command on these words will also help you achieve a good score in exams like CAT, GRE, GMAT, IELTS, TOEFL, etc.
3. Vocabulary Builder - Advanced
: Entrance exams require the possession of an extensive vocabulary and a high command over the language to achieve a good score. Definitions, usages, synonyms/antonyms will help you improve your vocabulary. This wordlist can be helpful for exams like CAT, MAT, XAT, NMAT, SNAP, GMAT, GRE, SAT, SSC, CGL, Bank PO, CET, GATE, IAS, IBPS, IELTS, IES, TOEFL, UPSC, JKSSB, PTE, DU JAT, TOEIC, NIFT, JBPS, CFE, etc.
4. English Idioms
: Improve English with this course where you learn about 250 common English idioms. This list will help you keep up with everyday English conversations.
5. Phrasal Verbs
: This course will help you easily understand the use of more than 200 of the most frequently used English phrasal verbs. Good understanding of these phrasal verbs will help in improving English, and also help you excel in various exams like CAT, XAT, NMAT, GRE, etc.
6. Commonly Confused Words
: This course will help you learn more than 200 homonyms, homophones, and other confusing words. Learning these homonyms and homophones will help you avoid the most common blunders made in English.
Games
1. Words Checker
: Improve reading skills by playing this fun vocabulary game.
2. Space Pursuit
: Improve writing skills by learning to tackle commonly confused English words.
3. Fly High
: Build your vocabulary by learning synonyms.
4. Reader's Digest
: Improve reading skills by focussing on speed, accuracy, and comprehension.
5. Echo
: Improve speaking and writing skills by correctly spelling words in this English dictation game.
6. Jelly Fizz
: Improve speaking skills by learning phrasal verbs in an interesting way.
7. Panda's Trail
: Refine your English grammar skills through this carefully crafted game.
8. Sea Voyage
: Challenge your reading speed and retention by playing this engaging game.
9. Word Maze
: Challenge your vocabulary knowledge and quick-thinking ability by playing this vocabulary game.
10. Spell Safe
: Learn to spell words that have confusing spellings with this game.
FEATURES
â€¢ Spaced learning and adaptive learning boost your brain to learn & retain lessons better
â€¢ Best English vocabulary builder app to learn new words on the go
â€¢ Improve listening and speaking skills from pronunciation audios
â€¢ Progress tracker
â€¢ Vocabulary revision tests that are personalised and adaptive
â€¢ Handy English flashcards to revise lessons
â€¢ 'A Word a Day' concept for aspirants of vocabulary based competitive tests
â€¢ Interesting word games and other language games (English dictation, phrasal verb identification, English grammar revision, etc.) to learn and improve English in a fun way
Google Playâ€™s Best of 2017 in the Best Hidden Gem category
Download the app for free and rediscover a fun way to improve English. Learning English on your mobile just got easier!

title: Sacra Script Bible Studies
description:
Experience the ultimate way to reconstruct and reconnect the events of Scripture. Finally, understand His-story and your place in it. This app contains several Bible studies that immerse you in the ancient world and our premium interactive resource which brings the setting of Scripture to life.
Never has so much been available in the palm of your hand. Reliable scholarship, simple explanations, and distinctive illustrations are the hallmark of these unique studies. Uncover the ancient context to better grasp God's intent and meaning of Scripture, from Genesis to Revelation.
Downloaded in over 100 countries around the world.
+ ENDORSEMENTS +
"If you want quality biblical content presented with quality creativity, then the biblical and theological materials being produced by our friends at Sacra Script should be on your desks or available at your fingertips through electronic media. Your Bible will become more meaningful and your confidence in its divine Author will be enhanced at every turn."
Mark L. Bailey
President, Dallas Theological Seminary
+ CONTACT +
If you have any questions, suggestions, or problems contact us as info@SacraScript.org

title: ASL Learning Flashcards
description:
Learn American Sign Language is a simple and fun way to learn signing, covering such useful topics as Greetings, Emergency Situations and more. In easy to follow lessons, professional sign language interpreter will teach you the basic skills needed to communicate with deaf friends, family, customers and co-workers.
Read along with the text as you watch the videos, then take a fun quiz to find out what you've learned! The innovative videobook format is intuitive to use and lets you quickly navigate with the swipe of a finger.
Features:
â€¢ Fast, easy-to-use interface makes it simple to learn
â€¢ Quickly swipe through videos and tap to play
â€¢ Practice in flash card mode and review vocabulary with text or video
â€¢ Play wherever and whenever you areâ€”it's the perfect way to learn on the go!
Covers:
â€¢ Meetings & Greetings
â€¢ The Manual Alphabet
â€¢ Home & Family
â€¢ Emergency Situations
â€¢ Everyday Communication
â€¢ Words & Numbers

title: CDL Practice Test
description:
CDL Practice Test Questions are an awesome way to get ready for your written CDL exams.
Commercial driver's license (CDL) is a driver's license required in the United States to operate any type of vehicle weighing more than 10,001 lb (4536 kg) for commercial use, or transports quantities of hazardous materials that require warning placards under Department of Transportation regulations, or that is designed to transport 9 or more passengers (including driver) for compensation, or 16 or more passengers (including the driver), for non-compensation. This includes, but is not limited to, tow trucks, tractor trailers, and buses.
This app includes CDL Test Prep (CDL Study Guide) for various categories:
- General Knowledge
- Hazardous Materials Test
- CDL Hazmat Test
- Passenger Vehicles
- Air Brake
- Combination Vehicles
- Doubles/ Triples Trailers
- Tanker Vehicles
- School Bus

title: Mermaids
description:
Mermaids are the most fantastic and beautiful princesses of the ocean. Come in and enjoy the mermaid painting and drawing salon. In this free coloring book game you find many coloring pages and pictures.
This app is designed to be fun and easy to use for a mixed audience of all ages, from young to old. Easy navigation make it fun for grown up women, but also easy to use for girls. We get lots of positive feedback from women of all ages, kids, teenagers and adult women. Even grandparents find it fun to paint and color in this app.
You can paint all designs with different colors and you can paint their hair, clothes, makeup and tail. But you also have the option to draw your own drawing or work with stamps and stickers. Also included are designs of fish and dolphins.
When you're done and have made a nice picture you can easily store your design to use as wallpaper or share it with friends or family.
We have a coloring book full of free pages of mermaids in many different themes which you can paint and draw:
- Mermaids in beautiful dresses with long tails and hair.
- Playing with other animals like fish, seahorses and dolphins.
- In love which kiss with merman.
- Looking for treasures while diving under the sea.
- A little mermaid excitement with scary sea creatures.
If you or your daughter likes mermaids she will also enjoy coloring and painting the models in this app.  And with all the colors you can chose from you can also makeover and color the makeup, tails and hair of these beautiful girls. Can you make them look like a real mermaid?
Or take a look at our other games with lovely designs for kids and adult. Drawing, painting, dress-up and makeover games to make beautiful pictures and stimulate the creativity of you or your son or daughter. We have lots of free painting and drawing games for boys and for girls.
All mermaid coloring pages are copyright protected by 2 Monkeys

title: Billionaire Mindset Course
description:
Everybody loves success. Why wouldnâ€™t they? Success is synonymous with all
things bright and beautiful. Success, in most peopleâ€™s eyes, means good fortune in
both the literal and figurative senses. It certainly brings an individual money, along
with the freedom that excess cash entails. It also brings other less tangible, but no
less desirable, effects, such as fame, recognition, power and influence. In other
words, success is a wonderful thing.
Our free Billionaire Mindset Course will help give you some great insights into how to think like a billionaire and achieve your dreams.
This wonderful app goes over many helpful tips and tricks that will guide to towards earning more money in your life. They are included below:
* What is your vision
* Learn how to stay focused
* Meaning behind risk-taking
* Google "Take Responsibility"
* Be Mindful
* Stay competitive
* Persistence is key
* It's who you know, not what you know
* and much, much, more.
This free app is so useful you won't be able to put it down. Start your journey today by downloading our free Billionaire Mindset Course.

title: ISS HD Live: Live Earth Viewing from Space Station
description:
Have you seen the Earth from International Space Station like the astronauts? It is visible in a 24/7 live video streaming!
If you like space or astronomy, you will like the ISS HD live app.
ISS HD live will show you a
live video feed of the Earth
from International Space Station directly on your android phone or tablet. ISS HD live offers you an exciting experience where everything is thoroughly thought and designed, the complete app that shows
Earth video streaming
about 400 km above it, with a lot of options fully customizable.
You will have available a stunning
live HD video streaming
to your device screen, directly from the
International Space Station cameras.
The app has integrated the native Android Google Map (ISS tracker) in it, where you can follow the ISS orbit around our planet, zoom, rotate, drag, tilt the map. Also, you can choose between different types of map, like Satellite or Terrain, and an information window is also presented with data such as ISS speed, altitude, visibility, country above which ISS is right now, latitude and longitude. Everything is customizable from settings menu.
You have seven different source of live video streaming:
1. Live HD camera
- a wonderful HD video streaming view of our planet
2. Live Standard camera
- this is not HD, but it shows a live streaming of the Earth and from time to time details of the ISS, like tests, maintenance and communication with Earth
3. NASA TV
- is the television service of the United States government agency NASA (National Aeronautics and Space Administration).
4. NASA TV Media.
5. Spacewalk (Recorded)
- Beautiful HD images from cameras of astronauts outside the ISS.
6. Inside the International Space Station
- Take a video tour of each module inside the ISS, all explained by the astronauts.
7. Eventual Channel
- Temporary live cameras from NASA, European Space Agency (ESA) and Russian Space Agency (Roscosmos)
You can watch these live feeds in your televisor using
Google Cast
You will be
notified
when next sunset or sunrise will occur allowing you to watch it live directly from International Space Station.
Do you want to see the ISS in the sky at night?
This is the easiest way to spot the station. With the built-in ISS detector tool, ISS HD Live will tell you when and where to look for the International Space Station. You get an alarm a few minutes before a pass. And you will get a notification when it will pass over your region during the daylight. By this way, you can admire your country from space.
You will be also notified when special events, such as spacewalk will occur.
Explore the International Space Station with
Google Street View
Aspiring astronauts can now pretend to float on the International Space Station (ISS), thanks to Google. The company worked with astronauts on the orbiting complex to provide a Google Street View of the low orbit satellite, from its science labs to its beautiful Earth-facing Cupola window.
Note:
When ISS (International Space Station) is on the night side of Earth, the video image is black, which is normal.
Sometimes video is not available due to transmission issues or when the crew is changing cameras. In such cases, usually you will have a blue or a blank screen. In few minutes the transmission should return, so, please be patient. This is not an app issue.
Twitter:
@isshdlive - You can find news, about ISS, Nasa, Space, Earth and the video streaming
Instagram:
isshdlive - Pictures taken of the earth by the streaming of the HD Camera, SD Camera and Nasa TV
Facebook:
isshdlive - Pictures, news and Information of ISS HD live app
description_html:
b'Have you seen the Earth from International Space Station like the astronauts? It is visible in a 24/7 live video streaming!

If you like space or astronomy, you will like the ISS HD live app.

ISS HD live will show you a live video feed of the Earth from International Space Station directly on your android phone or tablet. ISS HD live offers you an exciting experience where everything is thoroughly thought and designed, the complete app that shows Earth video streaming about 400 km above it, with a lot of options fully customizable.
You will have available a stunning live HD video streaming to your device screen, directly from the International Space Station cameras.
The app has integrated the native Android Google Map (ISS tracker) in it, where you can follow the ISS orbit around our planet, zoom, rotate, drag, tilt the map. Also, you can choose between different types of map, like Satellite or Terrain, and an information window is also presented with data such as ISS speed, altitude, visibility, country above which ISS is right now, latitude and longitude. Everything is customizable from settings menu.

You have seven different source of live video streaming:
1. Live HD camera - a wonderful HD video streaming view of our planet
2. Live Standard camera - this is not HD, but it shows a live streaming of the Earth and from time to time details of the ISS, like tests, maintenance and communication with Earth
3. NASA TV - is the television service of the United States government agency NASA (National Aeronautics and Space Administration).
4. NASA TV Media.
5. Spacewalk (Recorded) - Beautiful HD images from cameras of astronauts outside the ISS.
6. Inside the International Space Station - Take a video tour of each module inside the ISS, all explained by the astronauts.
7. Eventual Channel - Temporary live cameras from NASA, European Space Agency (ESA) and Russian Space Agency (Roscosmos)

You can watch these live feeds in your televisor using Google Cast

You will be notified when next sunset or sunrise will occur allowing you to watch it live directly from International Space Station.

Do you want to see the ISS in the sky at night?
This is the easiest way to spot the station. With the built-in ISS detector tool, ISS HD Live will tell you when and where to look for the International Space Station. You get an alarm a few minutes before a pass. And you will get a notification when it will pass over your region during the daylight. By this way, you can admire your country from space.

You will be also notified when special events, such as spacewalk will occur.

Explore the International Space Station with Google Street View

Aspiring astronauts can now pretend to float on the International Space Station (ISS), thanks to Google. The company worked with astronauts on the orbiting complex to provide a Google Street View of the low orbit satellite, from its science labs to its beautiful Earth-facing Cupola window.

Note:
When ISS (International Space Station) is on the night side of Earth, the video image is black, which is normal.
Sometimes video is not available due to transmission issues or when the crew is changing cameras. In such cases, usually you will have a blue or a blank screen. In few minutes the transmission should return, so, please be patient. This is not an app issue.

Twitter: @isshdlive - You can find news, about ISS, Nasa, Space, Earth and the video streaming
Instagram: isshdlive - Pictures taken of the earth by the streaming of the HD Camera, SD Camera and Nasa TV
Facebook: isshdlive - Pictures, news and Information of ISS HD live app'

title: Audio cuentos infantiles cortos
description:
Los cuentos infantiles son una herramienta perfecta, no solo para que los niÃ±os se interesen por la lectura, sino tambiÃ©n para que puedan potenciar y desarrollar la imaginaciÃ³n y su lado mÃ¡s creativo, fundamental para su futuro personal, social y laboral, asÃ­ como para poder ver la vida desde un punto de vista positivo y lleno de ilusiÃ³n. Sin embargo, a veces es difÃ­cil que los mÃ¡s pequeÃ±os se sientan interesados por la lectura de forma rÃ¡pida y eficaz, pues muchos tienden a sentirse agobiados por las pÃ¡ginas o vinculados a la lectura por un sentido de la obligatoriedad impuesta por parte de los adultos.
Por eso es fundamental crear mecanismos que sirvan para que los niÃ±os puedan acercarse al mundo de la lectura y de los cuentos para niÃ±os de manera natural, y en este sentido son muy Ãºtiles los audiocuentos infantiles, ya que permiten al niÃ±o descubrir la cantidad de enigmas y maravillas que contienen las historias que guardan los libros, pero de una forma mucho mÃ¡s sencilla, dinÃ¡mica y divertida.
Con nuestra APP de audio cuentos podremos conseguir que los niÃ±os comprendan que los libros y los cuentos cortos, y mÃ¡s extensos, son algo que merece la pena de verdad, y un verdadero tesoro capaz de colmarnos de alegrÃ­as y de ilusiones sin lÃ­mite.
En esta APP del Bosque de FantasÃ­as, maestros, abuelos, padres, madres y niÃ±os, podrÃ¡n acceder a una interesante recopilaciÃ³n de cuentos originales e historias de siempre adaptadas a los tiempos de hoy por la escritora Almudena Orellana. Un viaje gratuito al mundo de la fantasÃ­a y a algunos de los tÃ­tulos de cuentos cortos mÃ¡s populares de los Ãºltimos aÃ±os, como â€œEl dragÃ³n de las palabrasâ€ o â€œLupita, la mariquita ricaâ€.
Vive junto a los mÃ¡s pequeÃ±os un viaje inolvidable al paÃ­s de los sueÃ±os, dramatizado por una de las mejores voces del panorama nacional.
description_html:
b'Los cuentos infantiles son una herramienta perfecta, no solo para que los ni\xc3\xb1os se interesen por la lectura, sino tambi\xc3\xa9n para que puedan potenciar y desarrollar la imaginaci\xc3\xb3n y su lado m\xc3\xa1s creativo, fundamental para su futuro personal, social y laboral, as\xc3\xad como para poder ver la vida desde un punto de vista positivo y lleno de ilusi\xc3\xb3n. Sin embargo, a veces es dif\xc3\xadcil que los m\xc3\xa1s peque\xc3\xb1os se sientan interesados por la lectura de forma r\xc3\xa1pida y eficaz, pues muchos tienden a sentirse agobiados por las p\xc3\xa1ginas o vinculados a la lectura por un sentido de la obligatoriedad impuesta por parte de los adultos.

Por eso es fundamental crear mecanismos que sirvan para que los ni\xc3\xb1os puedan acercarse al mundo de la lectura y de los cuentos para ni\xc3\xb1os de manera natural, y en este sentido son muy \xc3\xbatiles los audiocuentos infantiles, ya que permiten al ni\xc3\xb1o descubrir la cantidad de enigmas y maravillas que contienen las historias que guardan los libros, pero de una forma mucho m\xc3\xa1s sencilla, din\xc3\xa1mica y divertida.

Con nuestra APP de audio cuentos podremos conseguir que los ni\xc3\xb1os comprendan que los libros y los cuentos cortos, y m\xc3\xa1s extensos, son algo que merece la pena de verdad, y un verdadero tesoro capaz de colmarnos de alegr\xc3\xadas y de ilusiones sin l\xc3\xadmite.

En esta APP del Bosque de Fantas\xc3\xadas, maestros, abuelos, padres, madres y ni\xc3\xb1os, podr\xc3\xa1n acceder a una interesante recopilaci\xc3\xb3n de cuentos originales e historias de siempre adaptadas a los tiempos de hoy por la escritora Almudena Orellana. Un viaje gratuito al mundo de la fantas\xc3\xada y a algunos de los t\xc3\xadtulos de cuentos cortos m\xc3\xa1s populares de los \xc3\xbaltimos a\xc3\xb1os, como \xe2\x80\x9cEl drag\xc3\xb3n de las palabras\xe2\x80\x9d o \xe2\x80\x9cLupita, la mariquita rica\xe2\x80\x9d.

Vive junto a los m\xc3\xa1s peque\xc3\xb1os un viaje inolvidable al pa\xc3\xads de los sue\xc3\xb1os, dramatizado por una de las mejores voces del panorama nacional.'

title: CompTIA A+ Certification: 220-901 Exam
description:
Free practice tests for CompTIA A+ certification exam: 220-901. Around 250 questions with answers.
[A+ Certification Overview]
Held by over 1â€‹ million IT professionals worldwide, CompTIA A+ is the most essential IT certification for establishing an IT career. If youâ€™re new to the IT industry, this will help you put your best foot forward. And if youâ€™re already an IT professional, the CompTIA A+ certification validates your skills and can boost your career.
CompTIA A+ certification includes 220-901 and 220-902 two exams:
- 220-901 covers PC hardware and peripherals, mobile device hardware, networking and troubleshooting hardware and network connectivity issues.
- 220-902 covers installing and configuring operating systems including Windows, iOS, Android, Apple OS X and Linux. It also addresses security, the fundamentals of cloud computing and operational procedures.
Number of exam questions: 90 questions
Length of exam: 90 minutes
Passing score: 675/900 (75%)
[App Features]
This app includes around 250 practice questions with answers/explanations ,and also includes a powerful exam engine.
There are "Practice" and "Exam" two modes:
Practice Mode:
- You can practice and review all questions without time limits
- You can show the answers and explanations anytime
Exam Mode:
- Same questions number, passing score, and time length as the real exam
- Random selecting questions, so you will get different questions every time
Features:
- The app will save your practice/exam automatically, so you can continue your unfinished exam anytime
- You can create unlimited practice/exam sessions as you want
- You can modify the font size to fit your device's screen and get best experience
- Easily go back to the questions which you want to review again with "Mark" and "Review" features
- Evaluate your answer and get the score/result  in seconds

title: SchoolDude CrisisManager
description:
SchoolDudeâ€™s CrisisManager allows public school districts, private and independent schools, colleges and universities, to publish their safety, emergency, disaster, crisis and preparedness procedures into an easy-to-use, 100% mobile platform.  Increase the readiness, awareness, knowledge, communication, safety and response times for your staff, faculty and students â€“ and put the power to quickly and safely respond to any event in the palm of their hand.  Whether you have one or several emergency and safety plans to meet the needs of various buildings, locations, campuses or groups, CrisisManager is the solution for you.  The Crisis Manager app provides your faculty, staff, and students with your actionable emergency and safety guidelines â€“ and event-specific contacts â€“ minimizing the confusion of what to do and who to call for specific emergency events. Your organizationâ€™s plan is stored locally on each userâ€™s smartphone or tablet computer, ensuring that they are always prepared to take action during a crisis â€“ regardless of telephone or internet connectivity. Plans donâ€™t have to be limited to standard emergency scenarios and specific uses â€“ any situation where readiness, preparedness or awareness is critical can have a plan.  You can add safety plans for Study Abroad, seasonal plans for Sporting events or Graduation, plans for the community and groups who rent your facilities, or a plan to address challenges like parking. Itâ€™s all customizable to meet your unique needs. Taking it one step further, CrisisManager is now equipped with Incident Reporting - allowing your staff, faculty, safety personnel and/or students to be an extra set of eyes during a crisis. Keep your students and faculty informed and prepared for the unexpected with SchoolDudeâ€™s CrisisManager app.
Benefits:
-Publish safety, emergency, disaster, crisis and preparedness procedures into an easy-to-use, 100% mobile platform.
-Increase the readiness, awareness, knowledge, communication, safety and response times for your staff, faculty and students.
-Quickly and safely respond to any event with information in the palm of your hand.
-Actionable emergency and safety guidelines â€“ and event-specific contacts
- Event icons guide users to specific guidance and instructions
- Event specific contacts eliminates the â€˜Who to callâ€™ confusion during a crisis
- Prepares your users for what to do in case of an emergency
- Plans can be published for public or private groups
- Push Notification allows you to send a message to your crisis plan users
- Incident reporting allows you to send a report from the app during a crisis or event
Features:
- One-click launch of phone numbers or websites
- Push notification
- Images and diagrams
- Incident Reporting
- Secure protection for limited access
- Unlimited downloads and unlimited users
- Icon-driven for easy guidance during a crisis
CrisisManager is free of charge to users to download and view crisis plans.

title: 3D Engineering Animations +
description:
"3D Engineering Animations: Third Dimension" provides information, visualization and animations on 3D models, which can be downloaded from Internet. A 3D interactive model helps to visualize working mechanisms from all sides. Models can be rotated, enlarged and panned.
Features:
1. Enable/disable 3D parts to see the parts which exactly you want to view.
2. Information of each 3D models' parts and other mechanism available through Animation Dictation and Search Engine.
3. Download 3D Models from Online Library and visualize them anytime. Some of the 3D Models in the Online Library:
a) V6 Engine (Automobile)
b) Arduino (Electronics)
c) Planetary Gearbox (Automobile)
d) Wind Turbine (Energy)
e) Car Suspension (Automobile)
f) Car Steering (Automobile)
g) Gear Transmission (Automobile)
h) Pneumatic Gripper (Hydraulics)
i) Stop Valve (Hydraulics)
j) Radial Engine (Aeronautics)
k) Watt Governor (Mechanical)
l) Differential System (Automobile)
m) Clutch Pad (Automobile)
n) Airbus (Visualisation)
o) Planetary Gearbox (Automobile)
p) Lathe (Industrial), etc. (More content added every week)
4. "Animations + Dictation of information related to the model" of 3D Models.
5. Rotation Sensitivity, Scale Sensitivity, Animation Speed of the 3d model can be controlled.
6. Eagle's Eye Mode: Can see through the objects for skeletal view of an object.
Usage and Navigation:
1. Rotate the scene by dragging your fingers over the model.
2. Zoom the model in and out by pinching with your fingers.
3. Select the focus mode, and focus on a particular part in a mechanism.
4. Toggle check/uncheck the part to enable/disable them.
5. Reset the camera to get the initial view of the model.
6. Internet Connection is mandatory to download models. Downloaded models can be viewed in Offline Mode.
Note:
App is supported in 6 Languages(+ dictation):
1. English
2. Spanish
3. Russian
4. German
5. Portuguese
6. Japanese
Note:
A 3D Model size ranges from 2-5 MB. Otherwise, internet connection is required for TTS information which hardly takes 1KB per session. So, only downloading models use up little data; visualising pre-downloaded models take negligible data, if internet connected.
This is a must have app for students who are interested in learning/visualising different structures in 3D animations.

title: ASVAB AFQT Test Pro 2018
description:
With ASVAB Test Pro, you can study for FREE with our questions, practice tests, flashcards, and score reports with detailed analytics. Best of all, you can access these features anywhere and anytime when you download our app.
This app helps you learn the critical concepts tested on the ASVAB Test Pro with detailed flashcards and practice questions. As you practice questions on ASVAB Test Pro, the app tracks your performance and highlights your test strengths and weaknesses, helping you zero in on what you need to study in order to boost your ASVAB test score.
Major Features:
- Practice with +2000 questions written by expert tutors which cover all sections of the Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery exam: Arithmetic Reasoning; Assembling Objects; Automotive  & Shop Information; Electronics Information; General Science; Mathematics Knowledge; Paragraph Comprehension.
- Get high score in ASVAB exam, it focuses on preparing the best background for users.
- Track your strengths and weaknesses with our in-app analytics
- Detailed statistics of your progress for every question
- Daily review calendar based on your study
- Support offline mode.
- Support text to speech
- Support dictionary

title: H&R Block Budget Challenge
description:
This App is free and works with the Sponsored version of Budget Challenge named H&R Block Budget Challenge found on www.hrblock.budgetchallenge.com and contains features to support the scholarship contest for high school students.
Budget ChallengeÂ® is an award-winning and patented program that actually SHOWS young people how to manage money in a real life setting.  We use a Learning-By-Doing approach to put students in the driverâ€™s seat in our Road Test for Personal FinanceÂ®.  Our contest simulations are 10 weeks in duration and students receive paychecks and bills in real time and are challenged to pay their bills and save money for retirement in a 401k.  Unlike other simulations, Budget Challenge is also a competition that scores and ranks students based on how well they save, answer weekly quizzes, and manage their financial responsibilities (pay bills).  Students can compete with other students in their class and classes can compete with other classes based on class average to make the learning of life skills engaging and fun.
The simulation does not use real money, but is extremely realistic including features such as online bill pay, direct deposit, email bill alerts, 401k paycheck deductions and more.  Budget Challenge also includes many of the complicated banking and credit card fees that plague young people in the real world, so students can learn the ropes and make their costly â€˜rookieâ€™ mistakes in the safety of the classroom.
Budget Challenge aims to make students Real World Ready by focusing on Behaviors, Knowledge, and Skills.  Our program aligns with NCEE and Jump$tart national standards and goes well beyond teaching vocabulary and financial concepts by putting these topics into action with real consequences.  This patented product delivers unparalleled results that really matter for students entering the real world.    The statistics below were from a study of over 25,000 students and were published on Time.com:
â€¢	92% said learning about money management was very important and 80% wanted to learn more
â€¢	92% said they were more likely to check their account balance before writing a check
â€¢	89% said they were more confident and 91% said they were more aware of money pitfalls and mistakes
â€¢	87% said they were better able to avoid bank and credit card fees
â€¢	84% said they were better able to understand fine print and 79% said they were better able to compare financial products
â€¢	78% said they learned money management methods that worked best for them
â€¢	53% said they were rethinking their college major or career choice with an eye toward higher pay
While most of the core functionality of the website is contained in this app, there are limitations of small screens, so some content has been abridged or removed from the app.  For first time users, we recommend playing the simulation for a week or two on a PC/Mac before using the app exclusively.
Achievements:
2015 EIFLE Award Winner: Education Program of the Year - Money Management
Patent Nos. 8,444,418 and 8,740,617
Presenter at National NCEE and NCSS conferences

-The category of Sea Animals includes animals like dolphin, shark, whale, walrus, octopus, penguin
and etc.
-The category of Birds includes birds like owl, crane, pigeon, stork, swallow, crow, eagle
and etc.
-The category of Insects includes insects like housefly, ant, dragonfly, bee, butterfly, louse, spider
and etc.

title: Bite of Reality 2
description:
Credit unions offer reality fairs to teenagers across the country, helping them to understand the need to understand money and budgeting. A reality fair is a fun, hands-on simulation that appeal to teens while giving them a taste of real-world financial realities  - giving them a better understanding of the challenges of living on a budget.
This app was developed by the Richard Myles Johnson Foundation.
Funding for this app generously provided by the National Credit Union Foundation.

title: COMIQ - SAT Math Practice
description:
Use your phoneâ€™s camera to capture difficult SAT Math questions, and we will tell you what *question type* you need help with and provide *helpful videos and additional practice questions.*
---
COMIQ is your COllection of MIssed Questions and your own personal tutor. Did you know similar questions appear repeatedly on the SATs? The key to raising your score is to (1) identify the types of questions that you keep missing, and (2) practice these types until you are confident in solving them.
COMIQ helps you do both. We have examined all of the available past SAT Math questions and categorized them into 60 specific question types. As you study, simply point your camera at questions you miss, and the app will take care of the rest. Over time, you will build a collection of targeted practice best suited to help you improve your score.
In short, COMIQ is the best way to prep for tests.
Ready? Download the app now and solve your way to success!

title: Adafruit Bluefruit LE Connect
description:
Wirelessly connect your Android device to Adafruit Bluefruit LE modules for control & communication with your projects.
Features:
â€¢ Send Android sensor & GPS data wirelessly over Bluetooth LE (Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life)
â€¢ Control Pad for simple directional control of your projects
â€¢ Control Arduino Digital, Analog, & PWM pin input & output
â€¢ Send & receive messages via UART monitor in Hex or ASCII format
â€¢ Control NeoPixels individually with an interactive color picker
â€¢ Scan & list nearby Bluetooth LE peripherals with RSSI and Advertisement data
â€¢ Connect & List peripheral Services & Characteristics in Info mode
â€¢ Serial Plotter to plot numeric data graphically
â€¢ Multiple simultaneous connections (UART and Serial Plotter only)
â€¢ Update your Bluefruit device to the latest firmware version from within the app
Learn more about Adafruit Bluefruit LE at:
http://www.adafruit.com/bluefruitle

title: Free Astronomical Sky Map
description:
Product description
How would you place them in orbit? If you are interested in Astronomy and looking for a powerful yet easy to use 3D universe sandbox app to create and simulate a whole new galaxy with realistic physics and gravity rules, then youâ€™ve come to the right place. Pocket Universe, the 3D gravity sandbox game, provides you the ultimate power to explore the infinite space and simulate your own space full of different planets, gas giants, and stars. In this gravity simulator app, you get to customize literally any aspect of these particles to simulate and design your very own pocket universe sandbox. Once you are satisfied with your customized solar system (or any other combination of particles, planets, and stars), you get to easily add it to your collection, take a screenshot and share it with the world. Pocket Universe comes with a clean and neat design and the 3D simulation is so smooth that you wonâ€™t feel any difficulties or lags when bombarding your planets, or applying any condition to them. And make sure not to take the realistic gravity lensing effect as granted when looking at a black hole. Itâ€™s just fascinating. Is Pocket Universe Easy to Use? Is this 3D universe sandbox with realistic physics simulation powerful enough to create and design different planets, gas giants and stars? The answer is a BIG yes! But are the simulation tools easy to use? The answer is even a BIGGER yes! The user interface is so friendly, that youâ€™ll get used to it after going through the step-by-step tutorial and trying available tools for a few times. After that, you just need to use your imagination and be creative to form some unique pocket universes with gravity simulator based on physics rules. If you are going to redesign our lovely solar system in our galaxy, youâ€™ll have access to all the planets (mars, moon, earth, mercury etc, and you have the power to unlock new worlds by meeting the right conditions, colliding with the right objects, and altering mass and sea level while keeping the temperature stable. To smash stuff together and create new planets, make sure to crash the right ones together. Tip: To raise the sea level, hit a planet with ice meteors, and use rock meteors to lower the sea level.
Product features
â€¢	Simple: Point your device at the sky to identify galaxies, stars, constellations, planets, and satellites (including the ISS and Hubble) passing overhead at your location.
â€¢	Augmented Reality (AR): Use your camera to spot objects in the sky, day or night.
â€¢	Social: Capture and share beautiful images with friends and family on social networks.
â€¢	Supports Space NavigatorTM binoculars, spotting scope, and telescopes.
â€¢	The most beautiful universe sandbox game available on mobile devices.
â€¢	Massive variation of procedural planets, gas giants and stars.
â€¢	Name your creations or use the unique random name generator.
â€¢	3D graphics that are out of this world.
â€¢	Black hole with realistic gravity lensing effect.
â€¢	Features all the planets from our solar system which are unlocked everyday.
â€¢	Share epic screenshots of your pocket universe with friends.
â€¢	The ultimate gravity sandbox game for those who love space simulators.
â€¢	Illustrating the phase of the moon with a picture
â€¢	Percentage of the visible moonarea
â€¢	list of upcoming full- & newmoons
â€¢	journey through time - in the past and future
â€¢	no permission needed
Technical details
Size:Â Varies by device (39.9MB - 45.6MB)
Version:Â Varies by device
Application Permissions
â€¢	Access fine (e.g., GPS) location
â€¢	Access coarse (e.g., Cell-ID, Wi-Fi) location
â€¢	Open network sockets
â€¢	Discover and pair bluetooth devices
â€¢	Access information about networks
â€¢	Required to be able to access the camera device
â€¢	Connect to paired bluetooth devices
â€¢	Read from external storage
â€¢	Get notified that the operating system has finished booting
â€¢	Write to external storage
Minimum Operating System:Â Android 4.0.3

title: Spanish English Translator
description:
Update info : Latest updates : New section added "Learning Lessons" Now learn Spanish and English using simple sentences.
You can learn English in Spanish or Learn Spanish in English.
New dictionary Spanish to English and English to Spanish added in the latest update.
Now translate from Spanish to English or English to Spanish, using your android mobiles with this easy translator app. Just get English Spanish Translator app downloaded in your mobile and start translating. Its a easy to use app with beautiful User Interface Design.
App features :
- Translate both ways from Spanish to English or English to Spanish.
- In-build Spanish keyboard given within the app itself. You can directly type in Spanish using this keyboard. You don't need to download any Spanish keyboard application from the play store.
- Copy and Paste features. You can copy the translated text Spanish or English, and use it anywhere you want.
- Useful for language learner, traveler, teacher, students, or anyone who doesn't know English or Spanish.
- Useful app for chatting. You can translate any text , copy and paste it to translator and copy paste the translated text back to chatting app.
How to use it :
- You can either type in to " Enter Text " box or paste any copied text directly to it.
- You can type in English using you default keyboard or directly type in in-build Spanish Keyboard.
- Click Translate button to translate your text.
- You can copy the translated text by clicking on "Copy" button and use the text anywhere you like.
Please drop in your suggestions and we'll work on it to improve the application.

title: Voting 4 Schools
description: Description â€“ Run your school student body elections online. In a few clicks you can create a school wide election with no need for paper ballots or Scantrons. Students can vote from home, school computer lab or, best of all, their smart phones! Results are instant and students are limited to only vote once per election. Schools can create unlimited elections, display student pictures, student biography and customize the look and feel to match the school site.
description_html: b'Description \xe2\x80\x93 Run your school student body elections online. In a few clicks you can create a school wide election with no need for paper ballots or Scantrons. Students can vote from home, school computer lab or, best of all, their smart phones! Results are instant and students are limited to only vote once per election. Schools can create unlimited elections, display student pictures, student biography and customize the look and feel to match the school site.'

title: Station Monitor
description: Explore earthquakes near you or from around the globe using the new IRIS Station Monitor app! Select from hundreds of seismic stations throughout the world. View up-to-the-minute recorded ground motions or see recordings from previous days and past events. Get information about recent events and choose to annotate wave arrivals.
description_html: b'Explore earthquakes near you or from around the globe using the new IRIS Station Monitor app! Select from hundreds of seismic stations throughout the world. View up-to-the-minute recorded ground motions or see recordings from previous days and past events. Get information about recent events and choose to annotate wave arrivals.'

title: Truth For Life
description:
Truth For Life is the official app for Alistair Begg's Bible-teaching ministry. Study God's word each day verse by verse and be encouraged with daily scripture readings and the devotional "Morning & Evening".
Features:
â€¢ Easily listen to today's program from Alistair Begg
â€¢ Follow along in the ESV Bible version as you listen to the program
â€¢ Read today's devotional from Charles Spurgeon and edited by Alistair Begg
â€¢ Watch the latest sermon video from Alistair
â€¢ Search programs, sermons, series and devotional archives back to 1983
â€¢ One-year Bible reading plan
For more information about Truth For Life or Alistair Begg, please visit: https://www.truthforlife.org/about/about-alistair-begg/. To submit a bug or feature
request, visit: https://www.truthforlife.org/about/contact-us/

title: Ureka
description:
What is Ureka?
Ureka is the future of science. It is a mobile platform for scientists to share their results in real-time, bypassing the long processes scientists often must undergo before their scientific results are shared. Ureka also serves as a hub for critique and collaboration at a global scale; we can greatly reduce the amount of time, energy, and funds spent on misguided science by increasing the number of people reviewing the research. With Ureka, science can evolve and excel exponentially -- the way it is meant to.
Who is it for?
Ureka is designed for both scientists and the general public. This extends from MDs who donâ€™t have access to publications and need to learn about current findings in the medical industry, to graduate students who have to rifle through hundreds of papers per day just to determine which publication contains the most current, relevant, and robust research results. Ureka will keep both academics and science enthusiasts abreast of the current trends in science inside a collaborative, user-friendly mobile platform.
What are the key features?
Ureka combines all of the best features of Instagram, Twitter, Slack, Linked-In, AcademicJobs, and more. Key features and capabilities include: post an image and description of the results to relevant science channels; subscribe and follow scientific channels specific to your interests to see the latest results in that research area; all channels have a trending feed and a time-dependent feed, so you can see the most recent and/or the most active posts; measurable in-app metrics that track user impact and activity, which can be used in the future for hiring practices and in-app awards. Future versions will include job hunting tools, conference support, private sub-channels, and animated posts.
How much does it cost?
Ureka is FREE. We believe that science should be open to everyone, but the current publishing schema is a crime against humanity. Taxpayer funds are pumped into institutions to fund scientific progress. Scientists then give their work away for free (or sometimes even at a cost) to publishers, who in turn make a large profit by hiding those results behind paywalls that cost readers hundreds to thousands of dollars per paper. Ureka will remove the proverbial middleman and provide the same services (and more) at no cost to the user.

You will have quick access to FAMU news and events, real time access to your course schedule, financial aid and registration, Rattler athletics news, schedules and scores, and FAMUâ€™s social media channels including Instagram, Twitter, Facebook and YouTube. title: LangJet - The fun language learning game
description:
Imagine learning new words fast and easy on a flying adventure in the sky... in a real language learning game!
Get ready for a fun language learning mission making memorizing words a piece of cake!
Do you want to study languages in a game for free? Are you looking for an easy language learning method?
You are at the right place - welcome to the free language learner paradise!
We all love learning languages, but we all hate studying vocabulary the hard way. It's slow and boring.
How about a language learning game that helps you learn different languages insanely fast and easy?
LangJet, formerly known as Space Polyglot, can make this language learner dream come true with a new easy language learning method. This language learning game aims to help any language learner acquire vocabulary without effort in an inovative way.
All you need to do is get on your aircraft and start flying it, avoiding crashes with wrong translations and flying obstacles that will challenge your skills. Simply navigate your plane hitting the correct translations and the words will magically stick to your mind - it's as easy as that.
A product of academic research, this fun and interactive language learning game applies special teaching strategies based on a
UNESCO-recognized easy language learning methodology
for superfast vocabulary memorizing. With this free lite version you can learn seven different languages very fast, memorizing up to 50 words and understanding a short text in a matter of minutes.

title: NCRC-UCSB
description:
The National Conflict Resolution Center app for training initiatives on college campuses. Building on the significant strengths that are naturally present on higher education campuses and NCRCâ€™s success in teaching people to communicate more effectively. NCRCâ€™s interactive training modules focus on how to communicate more effectively on campus and in the world these modules have been loaded into the app for easy accessibility. Students, faculty, and staff first learn how to deal with personal conflict effectively, the foundation for additional learning. Exploration of their personal and cultural identities help students, faculty, and staff understand how these relate to their own communication style and assist them in gaining an appreciation of the identity of others. Students, faculty, and staff learn how these different styles can sometimes be the root of communication breakdown; and, most importantly, how they can learn to recognize when a communication breakdown is happening and do something about it, both interpersonally and when others are in conflict.
This app was designed for our University of California Santa Barbara Campus Location. Our app features interactive tools with quick access to our training modules.  View the Calendar for upcoming trainings and save them to your phones native calendar to receive event reminders. Use the Lecture Recorder to record notes or lectures and much more.

title: What is this?
description:
This is an AI based computer vision app which can detect various objects that are contained inside the photo with good accuracy.
This is a practical application that shows the development in Artificial Intelligence that is taking place in the world.
This is MACHINE: This app is a Machine that tells what are in the picture. It's a pure intelligence at work.
Want to know what a machine thinks of the objects that are around us? This app is the answer to the question. This app can tell most of the objects that are available in the picture. Its a start to view the development in Artificial Intelligence.
How it works?
First step is to take a picture. You can either capture a live photo using your camera from the application or select a photo from your gallery.
Second Step is uploading the picture into the mind of the machine. Like the brain of a human, the machine takes your photo and processess it into its child like brain and works in it, bit by bit ,looking into its memory palace and finding the names of the objects that it can recall. It then, names those recognized objects and send those name to the application.
Final Step, after all the thought gathering,processing and going through the old memories, names are generated, box border are drawn and you can see the labels.
So, be ready to know what a machine thinks through this app.
You can try our web version at
https://playground.inspiringlab.com.np

title: Babies On The Homefront
description: Are you a military or veteran parent of a young child? This app is filled with information about your childâ€™s development, ideas for playing with your baby or toddler (even while deployed), dealing with challenging behaviors, and maximizing your own self-care. With your own private cloud account, you can confidently share photos and videos with both your co-parent across the world, or family across the country. Messaging allows you to share important family happenings between co-parents, emojis with your child, and send video of those amazing baby â€œfirsts.â€ Developed by ZERO TO THREE through a grant from USAA.

Love languages app for free is about relationships.

What if you could say or do just the right thing guaranteed to make your special someone feel loved? The secret is learning the right love language! Millions of couples have learned the simple way to express their feelings and bring joy back into relationships: The 5 Love LanguagesÂ®, Dr. Gary Chapman's New York Times bestseller! Don't know your love language? You and your loved one can take the profile within the app to find out what love language you speak.
Wheater you're a lover or loved in your relationship languages, you still can make such a great impact in your partner with taking some new concepts about love languages5, love languages,the five love languages5, love languages test,love language test,love language quiz,what are the five love languages,five love languages,5 love languages quiz,language books,words of affirmation love language,whats my love language,love languages list.
Love languages are different ways in which we connect with the people close to us. We each respond to the love languages in our own waysâ€”some of us especially appreciate reaffirming compliments and others find a thoughtful gift particularly heartwarming.
With a minute or two and this app, you can discover your own love languages and help those close to you show they care.
Included in this app is the popular, Love Language Challenge, which creates a way for couples to love one another in the love language they speak through a 5-week challenge. Through this experience, participants are guided towards ways to share a more loving relationship by speaking your loved one's language. title: ConjuGato â€“ Spanish Verbs Conjugation
description:
ConjuGato will help you master the hardest part of Spanish â€“ verb conjugations. Try it free and become fluent faster!
We created ConjuGato because we were learning Spanish and couldn't find an easy to use conjugation app. With ConjuGato you don't need to type the answers â€“ just think or say the correct verb and tap to check for yourself. This is the perfect app for practicing your conjugations on the go, whenever you have a free minute.
Feature Highlights:
â€¢ One-tap practice with a daily goal
â€¢ Mnemonic flashcards to learn similar verbs together
â€¢ 1000 of the most popular verbs with a conjugation table for each
â€¢ Conjugation cheat sheet for each verb
â€¢ Flexible settings to match your learning needs
Free version:
â€¢ 100 verbs, 27 rhymed flashcards
â€¢ All pronouns
â€¢ Indicative mood
â€¢ Present and Preterite tenses
Pro version:
â€¢ 1000 verbs, 104 rhymed flashcards
â€¢ All pronouns
â€¢ All moods: Indicative, Subjunctive, Imperative
â€¢ All 18 tenses: Present, Preterite, Imperfect, Pluperfect, Conditional, Future in different moods, plus their perfect aspects
The app is suitable for both Spanish and Latin American dialects â€” just disable â€˜vosotrosâ€™ and you are good to go.
Happy learning!

title: Calvary Chapel Nuevo
description:
OUR MISSION: To WORSHIP and glorify God in every area of our lives. To PROCLAIM salvation in Jesus Christ alone. To help one another become fully devoted DISCIPLES of Jesus Christ; following him and being transformed by him together.
OUR COMMITMENT TO YOU: Help you commit your life to Jesus Christ as Lord, and begin to follow Him. Help connect you with other believers for mutual encouragement and support. Help you develop a daily relationship with the Lord and experience real life transformation. Help you give and serve the Lord according to your natural and spiritual gifts.
Help you go and make other disciples.
We want to help you know and follow Jesus. We are a non-denominational, Bible teaching church. Our desire is simply to know Jesus and be transformed into His image by the power of the Holy Spirit.

title: Auburn Safety
description:
Auburn Safety is the official safety app of Auburn University. It is the only app that integrates with Auburn University's safety and security systems. Campus Safety has worked to develop a unique app that provides students, faculty and staff with added safety on the Auburn University campus.  The app will send you important safety alerts and provide instant access to campus safety resources.
Auburn Safety features include:
- Friend Walk: Send your location to a friend, who can watch you walk home in real-time.
- Emergency Contacts: Contact the correct services for the Auburn University area in case of an emergency or a non-emergency concern
- Tip Reporting: Multiple ways to report a safety/security concern directly to Auburn University security.
- Safety notifications: Receive instant notifications and instructions from campus safety when on-campus emergencies occur.
- Emergency Plans: Learn what to do in case of an emergency
- Campus safety resources: access all important safety resources in one convenient app.
Download today and ensure that youâ€™re prepared in the event of an emergency.

title: LAURA INGRAHAM SHOW
description:
Laura Anne Ingraham is an American conservative television and radio talk show host. Since 2001, she has hosted the nationally syndicated radio show The Laura Ingraham Show, is the editor-in-chief of LifeZette, and beginning in October 2017, has been the host of The Ingraham Angle on Fox News Channel. Born: 19 June 1963 (age 55 years), Glastonbury, Connecticut, United States
Children: Maria Caroline Ingraham, Nikolai Peter Ingraham, Michael Dmitri Ingraham

title: Learn English With YETi
description:
Fun & interactive English learning app with over 1300 different challenges, 36 categories and 7 different mini-games. Learn by reading, writing, listening and speaking.
The app has over 40 hours of content that has been carefully crafted by our ESOL tutors. The goal is to teach you the English language from basic to advanced level.
Our app features...
*7 Mini games
- Four picture match, tap on correct picture.
- Multiple choice quiz, select a correct answer.
- Reveal picture, tap on correct tiles in the right order to reveal the picture.
- Missing word, choose correct tiles in the right order to build a complete sentence.
- Translate text, read in English or in your native language and write in English or your native language.
- Speech recognition, listen to English voice over and repeat in English.
- Sentence builder, build a sentence in English from randomly ordered tiles.
* Download each difficulty level on your phone so that you can play completely offline.
* Take a quick test to jump to the next difficulty level if you are good enough.
* Access help menu from the sidebar navigation to read through large amount of information including a table guide.
We are constantly working on new translations so expect more languages to be available soon.
We aim for the app to be community driven, we value what you have to say so if you have any suggestions please submit them to support@yetienglish.com
Please report any bugs to android@yetienglish.com

title: Chesapeake Schools
description:
The Chesapeake Schools App by eSchoolView allows parents, students, teachers and administrators to stay connected in today's mobile world!
eSchoolView builds websites and creates educational management software for schools and school districts across the nation, including public, private, faith-based and charter systems. The company was founded in 2008 and has seen significant growth. Ranked for the second consecutive year on the Inc. 500/5000 list of America's fastest growing private companies, eSchoolView (1907) also works with a number of educational organizations throughout the states in an effort to build meaningful partnerships and networks within the industry. Founded in Columbus, Ohio, eSchoolView has offices in Charlotte, North Carolina and Fountain Hills, Arizona.
We also develop products on behalf of school systems across the country to improve efficiency and increase parent engagement. Our newest product OneView is the only solution available that integrates parent portal features, athletic forms, online enrollment for new student and forms for currently enrolled students in one complete package.

eSchoolView provides a number of other solutions to help school districts generate revenue, manage facilities and send instant safety alert notifications."

title: darknet: deep web: darknet app
description:
darknet app dowload deep web darknet app
DISCLAIMER.....
The information contained on this Darknet app is provided for educational and informational purposes only, and should not be construed as legal advice or as an offer to perform legal services on any subject matter. The content of this app.
Darknet DEEP WEB...
This is but a tiny corner of the internet, and the Dark Web and the Deep Web loom in much shadier corners. Using Tor you can access them, but should you even want to visit the Dark Web or the Deep Web?
Let's take a tour to help you make up your mind.
What is the Darknet Dark Web?
The DarkWeb is a term that refers specifically to a collection of websites that exist on an encrypted network and cannot be found by using traditional search engines or visited by using traditional browsers.
Almost all sites on the so-called Darknet DarkWeb hide their identity using the Tor encryption tool. You may know Tor for its ability to hide your identity and activity. You can use Tor to spoof your location so it appears you're in a different country to where you're really located, making it much like using a VPN service.
When a website is run through Darknet Tor it has much the same effect.
Indeed, it multiplies the effect. To visit a site on the Darknet that is using Tor encryption, the web user needs to be using Tor. Just as the end user's IP address is bounced through several layers of encryption to appear to be at another IP address on the Tor network, so is that of the website.
Are you trying to find out how to access the dark web and what is it?
It is extremely easy to access the darknet and even easier to be detected on it if you donâ€™t take precautions. If you are new to the darknet, this guide will help you on your way.
According to researchers, only 4% of the internet is visible to the general public.
Meaning that the remaining 96% of the internet is made up of â€œThe Deep Webâ€.
Dark Web or DarkNet is a subset of the Deep Web. If you are looking to access hidden marketplaceâ€™s or darknet websites (with a .onion domain) then darknet access is done using the TOR network with the TOR browser bundle. TOR is the most widely used dark web browser.
How To Access The Darknet Guide
Step 1: Go and get yourself a good VPN (Virtual Private Network) here, use it ALL of the time, no matter if you are on TOR or not. This site here reviews the best VPNâ€™s for use with TOR.
You should be taking your anonymity and security very seriously if you are visiting the DarkNet, especially if you are viewing any Darknet Markets.
Q: What is the Black Internet?
A: The term Black Internet usually refers to both deep web and dark web. These two terms often get confused, but in general, the black internet is considered to be a part of the internet that is not indexed by usual search engines.
It consists of millions of useful and interesting websites, but it also includes the darknet or dark web â€“ a place on the internet where black markets are located.
Q: What is DarkNet?
A: Darknet or dark web is a part of the deep web â€“ a non-indexed part of the web. Itâ€™s also a part of the Tor hidden network inaccessible through standard web browsers (Google Chrome, IE, Mozilla Firefox, etc.), but specific ones.
Darknet is associated with illicit activities and provides a path of communication among people who offer or use illegal services, such as illegal substances
Q: What is Dark Network?
A: Dark network refers to Tor hidden network â€“ a part of the deep web, additionally operating on the Tor network. To access it, you need to use a special program, the Tor browser.
The content of this network isâ€¦ well dark, since it is based mainly on illegal activities, which involve criminal actions, trafficking, Dark network owes its popularity to the anonymity it provides for users.

title: Japanese Candlestick Patterns
description:
must-read guide to candlestick charting techniques Japanese candlestick charting is a highly effective method for timing the market for short-term profits.
A Japanese candlestick chart provides the trader with crucial information about price action at any given point in time.
Learn the basic types of Japanese forex candlestick patterns in forex trading: spinning tops, marubozu, and Money Managemtn, Trading Strategies.
In technical analysis, a candlestick pattern is a movement in prices shown graphically on a candlestick
chart that some believe can predict a particular market movement. The recognition of the pattern is subjective
and programs that are used for charting have to rely on predefined rules to match the pattern.
Candlestick charts show the same information as bar charts but in a graphical format
that provides a more detailed and accurate representation of price action.
Candlestick charts visually display the supply and demand situation by showing who
is winning the battle between the bulls and the bears.
Candlestick charts reveal another dimension of the given periodâ€™s price action
by pictorially displaying the force (or lack of force) behind each price barâ€™s movement.
learning just a few key candlestick patterns WILL improve your ability to recognize trading opportunities
and, enter better trades!
The Japanese have been using these patterns for centuries,
1.Introduction
2. Candlestick Trading: The Basics
3. The Doji
4. Hammer and Hanging Man Signals
5. Inverted Hammer and Shooting Star Signals
6. Engulfing Signals
7. Dark Cloud and Piercing Signals
8. The Harami
9. Morning Star and Evening Star Signals
to trade rice of all things!
so, there is a rich history to the art of candlestick trading.

title: ABC Phonics Alphabets Tracing App For Toddlers
description:
Are you looking for a fun, free, and simple educational app to help your kids to learn phonics and trace letters of the abc alphabet?
ABC alphabets tracing app for toddlers is a free phonics and alphabet learning app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It is also having a little tracing games to help kids recognize letter associate them with phonic sounds, and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartner or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following stars with their finger.
Engage your toddlers in fun kidâ€™s activities to keep them from doing mischief because they are bored. Let them learn basic early education topics such as shapes, math, ABC, rhymes, sports, vegetables, counting, and many more including many baby coloring games.
