title: Superhero Coloring Pages
description:
This virtual coloring and drawing book, full of superhero pictures, is designed for all family ages, girls and boys alike (although, boys especially like it). It is suitable for both phones and tablets.
You can fill the colors in prepared image outlines and can also create your own original drawings. It is so simple and easy even the youngest kids can play it. The game includes a lot of beautiful images of famous and beloved superhero characters, including pictures similar to: Spiderman, Batman, Superman, Captain America, Thor, Groot, Hulk, Spiderman 2099, Ironman, Cyclops, Wolverine, Catwoman, Batgirl, Captain Marvel.
The game includes the following features:
âœ” 60 colorable pictures of heroes, etc.
âœ” 20 bright and beautiful colors to use for drawing and filling.
âœ” Filling an entire region with color, drawing with a pencil or a brush, and using an eraser.
Your can paint, draw, or doodle their favorite hero, or basically whatever they want. Doodling, painting, and drawing have never been easier and more fun, so let's start now with yours favorite Marvel and DC alike heroes, such as Spiderman, Batman, Superman, Captain America and more.
Our goal at Forqan Smart Tech is to provide the best value for your family, allowing them to develop visual and cognitive abilities, to learn to communicate with their peers and the environment around them, and to acquire important life skills. Each game is designed by a professional for the specific age group.
It is the time to have fun with our wonderful Superhero Coloring Pages game!

title: Learn Vietnamese with Master Ling

Whether youâ€™re a complete beginner and donâ€™t know any Vietnamese words and you want to learn the basics of the language, or youâ€™re already pretty fluent and want to learn advanced Vietnamese or brush up on your knowledge â€“ Ling has you covered!
Traditional Vietnamese language lessons can be boring, dull and no fun at all. At Ling, weâ€™ve made the learning process fun by using puzzles, games, challenges and quizzes to teach you how to read, write and speak Vietnamese!

OUR  TEACHING MINI GAMESâ€¦

â¦ Flashcards

title: White House Green Building
description: This app allows museum visitors to engage with the exhibit â€œWhite House, Green Buildingâ€ at the Clinton Presidential Library. Through the use of AR (augmented reality) technology, users can play three different games on their phones: LEED Scavenger Hunt, Build Your Own Green House, and All About the Tiny House. For a full, dynamic experience in the gallery, you won't want to miss this app!

title: Inspire Elementary
description:
The Inspire Elementary App connects parents with the school and all its important information. Install this app to know what is going on at your school and to get involved!
This app includes notifications to alert you to any important announcements you need to know!
Also, ways to volunteer and contribute to our school.  AND SO MUCH MORE!!!
- One click access to call or email school
- Event Calendar
- Food Menus and Payments
- Links to all your favorite school web pages
- PTO Information
- Fundraisers
- Sign-up to be a Volunteer
- Social media
- And so much moreâ€¦.

title: Mariner License Prep
description:
!!!!Mariner License Prep is the most up-to-date App designed to help you study and PASS the U.S. Coast Guard DECK & ENGINE Exams for ALL ratings!!!!!
Practice your license ANYWHERE. On the toilet, in class, on a ship. Works fully OFFLINE.
Bookmark your questions to come back to later! Search the over 20,000 questions for key words!
Studying for USCG License Exams has never been easier! This App will help you knock hours off your study time!!
INCLUDED:
â€¢	FULL up-to-date question bank directly released from the USCG.
â€¢	ALL diagrams that have been released directly from the USCG.
â€¢	Practice Questions over and over while TRACKING your strong and weak areas.
â€¢	See which questions you are consistently get wrong.
â€¢	Generate PRACTICE TESTS
â€¢	Search questions banks for KEY WORDS, USCG numbers, and Diagram References in over 20,000 questions.
â€¢	SUBCATEGORIES added to every questions. Focus on specific areas you are weak!
â€¢	Track the your score in real-time as you practice the questions.
â€¢	See the questions you answered correctly and incorrectly immediately.
*** IMPORTANT ***
ALL QUESTIONS ARE FULLY UP TO DATE FROM THE USCG.
MARINER LICENSE PREP IS NOT IN ANYWAY ASSOCIATED WITH USCG.
*******************
CONVENIENT FEATURES:
â€¢	No Internet Connection Needed! Study in the middle of the ocean pain-free.
â€¢	Choose your license and you will ONLY see the questions on YOUR exam
â€¢	Intuitive Interface which is easy to navigate
â€¢	Know what to expect on the tests, BEFORE taking them.
+ Questions will be updated as the Coast Guard updates them
+ Updates to improve features, App performance and efficiency will frequently be released
As a mariner, we need all the support we can get to make this APP everything mariners NEED it to be. Please leave a rating and offer any suggestions at support@marinerlicenseprep.com.

title: Preschool Adventures 1
description:
Education puzzles for 3-4 years old children as well as adults who want to learn basics of different 11 languages!
A wonderful application for 3-4 years kids, Completely safe, this game proves to be the best kids game to help your child grow, learn, have fun, and even give parents some time off. With four fun, colorful and educational sections, Preschool Adventures-1 has 36 puzzles specifically designed to contribute to, exercise and develop your child's cognitive skills and general information.
With this game your kid learns:
âœ” Numbers: 1-10 (with sounds)
âœ” Shapes: square, circle and triangle (with sounds)
âœ” Sounds and names of animals.
âœ” Colors (with sounds).
âœ” Names of vegetables and fruits.
âœ” Similarities of: transport, animal, fruits, clothes, insects, fish, dolls, kitchenware, work tools.
âœ” Sizes: big, medium and small (with sounds)
âœ” Bilateral awareness
âœ” Shadow of objects
âœ” Transport: different vehicles.
âœ” Electric appliances
âœ” Sea creatures.
The puzzles are coming with sounds of animals, birds, musical-instruments, cars, tools, dolls and other objects.
â™¥ The puzzles are prepared by a child's mental development specialist.
â™¥ The application was tested on tens of 3-4 children prior its release.
The puzzles contain pictures of numbers, flowers, cartoons, transportation, fruits, vegetables, dolls, fishes, cloths, electrical equipment, kids' faces, sport, shapes, animals, insects, cars, colors and tools.
The puzzles also contain sounds: sounds of musical instruments, sounds of animals and birds, numbers by sound and other sounds effects.
We, at Foxi Studios have always sought to provide the best for your children through applications designed, and directed each age group separately, our belief in the feature each evolutionary stage passes by your son, but in order to lend life skills and the mentality to learn and grow and play correctly and properly, and to communicate with his peers and the environment surrounding it.
Let's your kid enjoy and learn with our wonderful game Preschool adventures!

title: Laura G. Vonfrolio CCRN Review
description:
Welcome to the Laura Gasparis Vonfrolio, RN, PhD Critical Care Examination Review app! You are going to love this app-it is easy to navigate, informative, and fun! It is jammed packed with lots of information written by nurses who are current in their field of expertise.
In order to provide you with more information, there are over 1,200 questions with answers and when appropriate explanations why the three other answer choices are incorrect.
This app is setup according to AACN's Adult CCRN Examination Blueprint. The following areas are covered: Cardiovascular, Pulmonary, Endocrine, Hematology & Immunology, Neurology, Gastrointestinal, Renal, Multisystem, and Professional Caring and Ethical Practice. Each clinical knowledge section begins with the basics and progress to an advanced level of knowledge.
Patient case studies are included with each section to assimilate clinical knowledge and enhance decision-making skills. This app is an excellent review for those nurses preparing for the AACN's CCRN Certification Examination; as well as for nurses wanting to update, enhance, and validate their current knowledge of bedside critical care.
I wish you lots of luck in your quest of critical care knowledge and the pursuit of your CCRN certification
Laura Gasparis Vonfrolio, RN, PhD

title: My Review Assistant: BLEPT Reviewer - FREE Version
description:
My Review Assistant App is an effective assessment tool of preparedness for education students/graduates, in taking the Board Licensure Examination for Professional Teachers (Philippines).
Assessment and Preparedness: Availing the My Review Assistant App will allow education students/graduates to assess their preparedness in taking the BLEPT, of which statistical results will allow them to identify their weak areas.
How to Become Licensed Professional Teachers:
(1) Education Students/Graduates could do Self-Review or attend School/Review Center Traditional Review Program
(2) Education Students/Graduates could use My Review Assistant App for Knowledge Reinforcement and Retention till the board exam.

Advance Mobile Repairing app has a comprehensive and detailed approach towards each and every aspect of mobile repairing. If you wish to learn mobile repairing in general or planning a career in mobile repairing, this app can be of a lot of help for you. Detailed approach with diagrammatical illustrations and step by step instructions makes it a user friendly app. It is one of the best self-help apps available in the given category.
Major focus of the app is on understanding the entire system by which the mobile works. Author believes if you know the basic about how actually a cell phone works, then diagnosing the problem and finding a solution for it will not be a big issue for you. There are many short hands on solution which can be tried on initial stages and problem solving can be done without actual diagnosis. These hands on solution have been explained in detail in the app.
Apart from that, hardware and software of the mobile phones have also been discussed in detail. Common problems which usually occur in almost all kinds of cell phone along with their solution have been discussed in detail in this app. Whether you have some or no experience in the field of cell phone repair.

title: JUDGE JUDY SHOW (UPDATED)
description:
This courtroom programme stars former family court judge Judy Sheindlin. Each episode finds Judge Judy presiding over real small-claims cases inside a televised courtroom. Her no-nonsense, wisecracking approach has been unsuccessfully copied by other TV court judges.

Theme song: Judge Judy Theme Song
No. of episodes: 5,909 (as of May 12, 2017)
Judge: Judy Sheindlin

title: Cornerstone Nashville
description:
This app is packed with powerful content from Pastor Galen Davis and resources to help you grow and stay connected with Cornerstone Nashville. With this app you can:
- Watch the services live
- Watch past messages
- Discover more about the church and all the relevant ministries offered for your family
- Follow along with our Bible reading plan
- Sign up for events
- Get involved in Life Groups
- Give online
- Stay up to date with push notifications
- Submit prayer requests
The mission of Cornerstone Church is: Loving God. Loving People.
Cornerstone Nashville is a diverse community of people committed to attracting, winning, developing and empowering people around the world to celebrate the life-changing presence of Jesus Christ in their lives. We fulfill our mission through 4 major areas: Preaching, Teaching, Worship and through our Life Groups.
www.CornerstoneNashville.org

title: LSE Student Hub
description:
The app brings together everything that LSE has to offer, helps you to create communities and friendships and makes your experience at LSE the best it can be.
The Student Hub will connect you to your time at university like never before:
ORGANISE
- View your timetable, events and deadlines all in one place.
- Get notified about timetable changes and upcoming deadlines.
COLLABORATE
- Connect with friends, peers and the LSE community.
- Start 1-2-1 or group conversations with your coursemates.
DISCOVER
- Find your way around with the campus map.
- Stay up to date with news and events from around your School.
We know you canâ€™t wait to start using the Student Hub, but youâ€™ll need to register on campus and set up your LSE email account first. Then youâ€™ll be good to go!

title: The Jackson Elementary School
description:
The Jackson Elementary School app by SchoolInfoApp enables parents, students, teachers and administrators to quickly access the resources, tools, news and information to stay connected and informed!
The Jackson Elementary School app by SchoolInfoApp features:
- Important school and class news and announcements
- Interactive resources including event calendars, maps, staff directory and more
- Student tools including My ID, My Assignments, Hall Pass and Tip Line
- Language translation to more than 30 languages
- Quick access to online and social media resources
About SchoolInfoApp:
We build great apps for great schools and school districts and have published apps serving thousands of schools and districts around the globe. All we do is develop and manage mobile apps for schools and school districts, so our focus is 100% on doing that incredibly well. The result is apps that are highly rated with features that students, parents, teachers and administrators find to be time-saving, simple and useful.
Features listed may or may not be included depending on your school or district's policies and preferences.

title: Tango - Japanese Vocabulary Trainer
description:
Tango is an All-In-One Vocabulary Trainer for beginners up to advanced learners. Tango uses Space Repetition to help you learn new words and Kanjis as efficient as possible. You can learn by choosing one of the handcrafted themed Wordbundles or add words from your Japanese Class or Textbook.
Tango is meant to be your complete Japanese vocabulary storage. It helps you to get all the information about new words or words you already know. It helps you to keep track of your learning progress within the Japanese Language Levels.
Tango has a large offline database of all the commonly used words and Kanji together with audio. If you come across a new word just search for it and add it to your Study List!
Tango tries to offer you all you need to learn Japanese vocabulary:
â€¢	Vocabulary Trainer
â€¢	Kanji Trainer
â€¢	Offline Dictionary for words and Kanji
â€¢	Example sentences
â€¢	Audio training
â€¢	JLPT Level Training

title: Reach Assembly of God
description:
With the Reach church app, you can experience Reach church anywhere. You can view live services, catch up on recent messages and learn about upcoming events. This app provides access to life-changing audio and video sermons and relevant information about Reach
The Reach app features content from Pastor Dennis Marcelino DaSilva, who leads Reach Assembly of God based in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.
Reach Assembly of God church wants to make a lasting difference in your life, in our community, and in the world by standing up for the Gospel of Jesus Christ Loving God, Loving people, Serving people.
. Watch or listen to messages
. Download audio and video messages
. Connect with Reach church
. Follow along with the service in the app

title: Learn English through Movies with Video subtitles
description:
If youâ€™re tired of going to class or reading a book, thereâ€™s nothing better than learning English through movies and film.
Learn English Video, English Movies: Learn English with Subtitles is your best application to improve your English Pronunciation, English Vocabulary, English Speaking, English Listening, English Grammar, English Writing any so much more.
* LEARN ENGLISH:
You will learn English through thousands of english movies, english films,english videos and english songs with English subtitles and you must listen english through english movie to improve skill english conversations. Study English quickly and easily!
* PRACTICE ENGLISH:
Listen to the English conversations then practice speaking yourself and you read english with english subtitle in videos. You can speak English daily with a particular video to improve your speaking skill every day.
The user can record his/her voice to practice pronunciation, study english with english video every day.
* FEATURES:
Display subtitles of videos support user learning English easily.
- Practice listening english each sentence in the subtitle.
- With feature speaking, the application helps to rate the user's voice.
- The user can record his/her voice to practice pronunciation.
- Taking notes and add video to favorite.
- Add favorite playlists.
- Search videos and playlists.
Learn English with english movie subtitle is an application for learning English by videos with common topics in English such as:
1. ENGLISH SKILLS
Study English Vocabulary
Learn English Pronunciation
Learn English Speaking
Learn English Listening
Learn English Reading
Learn English Writing
Learn English Grammar
Learn English Idioms
2. ENGLISH EXAMINATIONS
TOEFL
TOEIC
IELTS
3. LEARN ENGLISH IN A FUN WAY
ENGLISH MOVIES
FUN ENGLISH
Friends MOVIES
4. ENGLISH TV SHOWS
Let's Talk In English
English Today
Learn English with Subtitles
Why learn English with films?
Watching films is a lot more fun than studying with a textbook! It can also be just as useful. Here is why sitting down with a movie in English will improve your fluency:
REAL ENGLISH â€“ Textbooks are great for learning vocabulary or grammar, but nothing is better than listening to real native English. By watching British and American films, you can listen to native English actors speaking the language in a natural way. This will help you learn modern English and sound more like a native speaker in terms of vocabulary and style.
BETTER PRONUNCIATION â€“ Sometimes it can be hard to know how an English word is pronounced. Hearing native speakers in movies will teach you the correct way to say things. Dialogues in films also provide good examples of how sounds in words change in connected speech.
LIVE CONTEXT â€“ When you learn a word, it can be difficult to remember what it means or how to use it. In films, words are used as part of a story and this context helps you to learn and remember them more effectively.
NATIVE ACCENTS â€“ Across Britain and America there are many different accents used to speak English. When watching films, you will hear many regional accents being used and this will help you to understand them better. Textbooks seldom provide information about English accents.
EXPLORE CULTURE â€“ You can learn about the culture behind the language when you watch movies in English. Language and culture are closely connected. Why not study both at the same time by watching original films?

Why learn English with films?
Watching films is a lot more fun than studying with a textbook! It can also be just as useful. Here is why sitting down with a movie in English will improve your fluency:

REAL ENGLISH \xe2\x80\x93 Textbooks are great for learning vocabulary or grammar, but nothing is better than listening to real native English. By watching British and American films, you can listen to native English actors speaking the language in a natural way. This will help you learn modern English and sound more like a native speaker in terms of vocabulary and style.

BETTER PRONUNCIATION \xe2\x80\x93 Sometimes it can be hard to know how an English word is pronounced. Hearing native speakers in movies will teach you the correct way to say things. Dialogues in films also provide good examples of how sounds in words change in connected speech.

LIVE CONTEXT \xe2\x80\x93 When you learn a word, it can be difficult to remember what it means or how to use it. In films, words are used as part of a story and this context helps you to learn and remember them more effectively.
NATIVE ACCENTS \xe2\x80\x93 Across Britain and America there are many different accents used to speak English. When watching films, you will hear many regional accents being used and this will help you to understand them better. Textbooks seldom provide information about English accents.

EXPLORE CULTURE \xe2\x80\x93 You can learn about the culture behind the language when you watch movies in English. Language and culture are closely connected. Why not study both at the same time by watching original films?"

title: Tulsa Regional STEM Alliance (TRSA)
description:
Tulsa Regional STEM Alliance is an intermediary organization who's focus is to build broad, deep and innovative STEM pathways for all students to access high-impact careers.
Our app is meant to not only be a quick access point to some of our most utilized news, events, and resources but also a way to keep up to date on TRSA offerings through notifications.
Push Notifications allow you to receive information as soon as we publish a new event or grant, as well as deadline reminders, ensuring that you'll always be in the know.  This is a great way to keep updated without having to constantly check the website for updates.
description_html:
b"Tulsa Regional STEM Alliance is an intermediary organization who's focus is to build broad, deep and innovative STEM pathways for all students to access high-impact careers.

Push Notifications allow you to receive information as soon as we publish a new event or grant, as well as deadline reminders, ensuring that you'll always be in the know. This is a great way to keep updated without having to constantly check the website for updates."

title: Future Book Dino songs1
description:
The official mascots of  Future Book, Futurebot and I-bot , go to the dino world~!
Key Features:
Experience the world of exciting kid songs, animated videos and fun interactive games
with baby dinosaur, Tino.
Enjoy fantastic dino songs not only at home or in the car, but also anywhere such as the public place. (If you use WIFI during downloading it, there is no additional cost.)
â—€â—€The list of songsâ–¶â–¶
â˜… T-Rex will be born
â˜… DINO SUPERSTAR, T-REX
â˜… Yummy Yummy
â˜… KING OF DINOS
â˜… IT GOES DOWN IT COMES OUT
Let's meet dinosaurs kids love through exciting songs and various activities.
Kids can get a lot of useful information of dinosaurs as well as participate in activities they are able to do by themselves.
1. Videos of children's songs relating to various dinosaurs
- How were dinosaurs born? What are characteristics of dinosaurs? Where do they live? What do they eat? Do they have poop?
Learn about them through easy and exciting songs.
2. T-Rex will be born
- Where were animals born?
Open eggs and find out how animals are born.
3. DINO SUPERSTAR, T-REX
- The T-Rex Kids love becomes a superstar.
Find out what Tyranno's body looks like, and complete the T-Rex with the bones.
4. KING OF DINOS
- Where do Dinos live?
Move the dinosaurs according to the place they live and watch it carefully.
5. Yummy Yummy
- What do dinosaurs eat everyday?
Learn about what dinosaurs eat and when the right food goes by, please shoot and drop it.
6. IT GOES DOWN IT COMES OUT
- When a dinosaur ate a lot, the gas comes out!
Help me rub the belly of a baby dinosaur with a stomachache.
Dino songs will continue to be upgraded!

title: Component Finder Free: Electronic Parts, Datasheet
description:
Electronic " Component Finder Free " is a lightweight and easy to use Electrical, Electronics and several other parts finder app using Octopart online database.
Thanks to Octopart for this huge database.
This Free version contains advertisements. If you dont like ad please buy our pro(Component Finder Pro) version.
You can now search components, see their detailed specifications, prices and browse complete list of parts divided by categories. You can add your desired component is favorite list so that next time you don't need to search again.
This app require internet connection.
Features:
# search parts by name
# favorites list
# see parts specifications
# distributors and prices
# view and save datasheets
# browse parts by category
Total Parts and  main categories:
# Integrated Circuits (ICs) -  Parts : 879302
# Discrete Semiconductors -  Parts : 234424
# Passive Components - Parts : 4076279
# Electromechanical - Parts : 659579
# Connectors - Parts : 6763152
# Test Equipment - Parts : 18419
# Sensors - Parts :125244
# Optoelectronics - Parts : 111954
# Circuit Protection - Parts : 268267
# Power Products - Parts : 394974
# Cables and WIre - Parts : 434455
# Machining - Parts : 135839
# Industrial Control - Parts : 402055
# Tools and Supplies - Parts : 701536
Permission needed:
INTERNET: required to search parts, categories, and to make parametric search.
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: required to check if internet connection is active.
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: required to read cached images, and datasheets.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: required to save images, and datasheets.
Thanks for using our app. If you find any bug please contact with us we ll solve your issues.
Thanks
CRUX App Team
www.cruxbd.com
www.cruxrobotics.com

title: English 101
description:
Learn to write and pronounce English language alphabets easily using three fun modes.
â€¢ EASY mode provides a hand pointer to guide you in writing the alphabets.
â€¢ NORMAL mode is the next level where you would practice writing with more accuracy.
â€¢ FREESTYLE mode gives you the freedom to write in your own style. You can use this mode to test your learning from the other modes.
As you practice and learn new alphabets, you could also easily share a screenshot with your friends. Learn, share and enjoy!
Please visit aspulstudios.com/english/android/contact and suggest a new feature that you would like to see in the future updates. Follow us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/aspulstudios. Thank you.

title: miniPCR App v2.0
description:
The miniPCR App gives mini8 and mini16 users the power to program, monitor, and analyze PCR experiments with interactive graphing and analysis capabilities. mini8 devices require USB on-the-go (OTG) connectivity and mini16 devices connect via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).
This convenient app brings DNA science to life on your computer, tablet, or phone. It is beautiful, powerful, and simple.
New features:
- mini16 support via Bluetooth
- Program multiple miniPCR devices in one tap (batch programming)
- Flex mode with touchdown PCR capability (mini16 only)
- Monitor and control multiple miniPCR devices (mini16 only)
Program and Share
- Intuitive visual programming interface
- Set PCR parameters with ease
- Heat Block mode for steady temperature incubations
- Linear Ramp mode
- Copy, edit, and modify programs with ease
- Unlimited program storage
- Export and share program libraries
Monitor and Analyze
- Plot reaction parameters in real time
- Interactive PCR animations and graphs
- Full control of run and device status (Run, Pause, Stop)
- Export data to .csv file for documentation, analysis and quality control
miniPCR thermal cyclers make DNA science and discovery accessible to everyone, everywhere. Questions about features or compatibility with your device? Contact miniPCR support: support@minipcr.com

description_html:
b'The miniPCR App gives mini8 and mini16 users the power to program, monitor, and analyze PCR experiments with interactive graphing and analysis capabilities. mini8 devices require USB on-the-go (OTG) connectivity and mini16 devices connect via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).

This convenient app brings DNA science to life on your computer, tablet, or phone. It is beautiful, powerful, and simple.

New features:
- mini16 support via Bluetooth
- Program multiple miniPCR devices in one tap (batch programming)
- Flex mode with touchdown PCR capability (mini16 only)
- Monitor and control multiple miniPCR devices (mini16 only)

Program and Share
- Intuitive visual programming interface
- Set PCR parameters with ease
- Heat Block mode for steady temperature incubations
- Linear Ramp mode
- Copy, edit, and modify programs with ease
- Unlimited program storage
- Export and share program libraries

Monitor and Analyze
- Plot reaction parameters in real time
- Interactive PCR animations and graphs
- Full control of run and device status (Run, Pause, Stop)
- Export data to .csv file for documentation, analysis and quality control

miniPCR thermal cyclers make DNA science and discovery accessible to everyone, everywhere. Questions about features or compatibility with your device? Contact miniPCR support: support@minipcr.com

miniPCR and the miniPCR logo are trademarks of Amplyus, (c) 2014-2018. All rights reserved.

Versions 2.0 and higher are compatible with mini8 and mini16 PCR thermal cyclers by miniPCR.'
